title: cant open PBE as a new player
body:
i'v just downloaded the game and make an account i sign in then the game wanted me to choose a name i'v write a lot of names but it says "name currently  unavailable enter a new name and try again"
i dont think its because of me riot pls fix i want to try the bruisers update

replies.body: I think I saw a few people discussing this, it may be broken on PBE. I think they were going to dig a bit deeper tomorrow. I think there was also a thread about it on the pbe forums.
a rioter ? thx for the reply that was fast
